column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. BASE IS CAPTURED. I REPEAT BASE HAVE BEEN CAPTURED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. ENEMY REINFORCEMENTS HAVE BEEN REPELLED. OVER.
THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK. COPY. ON OUR WAY ETA ONE MINUTE. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ECHO. OUR TROOPS ARE IN. GET GOING. I BUY YOU BEERS IF YOU DO THIS FASTER THAN ME. OVER.
COPY CHARLIE. ECHO BLACK IS INBOUND AND READY FOR SOME BEERS LATERON. OVER.
ECHO TO CHARLIE. TROOPS ARE OFF. HEADING BACK TO BASE. HEY CHARLIE, THE BEERS ARE ON YOU HEHE. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE AT THE BASE. OVER.
DELTA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. IN POSITION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. THATS A COPY. KEEP IT SECURE WE WILL SEND IN THE HELOS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO CHARLIE BLACK. YOU ARE CLEARED TO PROCEED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. GOOD JOB. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
